description: Genjimaru is an old, but extremely powerful mononofu serving under Kuuya. He is also Hien and Sakuya`s grandfather. His main weapon of choice is a long sword. He was instrumental in helping the other nations defeating the Avu-Kamuu, by revealing their weakness. He would later be killed by Dii as "payment" in canceling Kuuya`s contract.
name: Genjimaru
